description: great app, from the best games
A bit like minesweeper, but even less fun to play. And not very nicely designed either.

This is a perfectly good game, with a competent implementation of the puzzle and some nice features, ruined by the off-putting remarks it makes when you finish a game slower than it thinks you ‘should’. Play a version (like Simon Tatham’s) that doesn’t insult you instead.
You can pass some time on it, choose "Very Easy" difficulty after pressing to do the tutorial and doing it in the beginning. The tutorial should have been clearer anyway.
summary: Do the tutorial and you will understand how to play it
